title: Who's the easiest female champion to cosplay?
body:
stupid question ik
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
so, I wanna try cosplay a champion from league, and it's better if the champion is a female.
I'm a tall girl, medium build, and I don't like showing too much of my body (such as pool party Fiora or default missfortune). And.. i hope it won't be too expensive(GG missfortune with her machine gun no I cant afford that)...
so what are the champs/skins fit me?
